Product title: MR.SIGA Toilet Plunger and Bowl Brush Combo for Bathroom Cleaning, Black, 1 Set
Key Features: 2 in 1 : The product contains a high efficient toilet brush, a powerful toilet plunger and a two-compartment steady holder. Space saving stylish design and convenient storage, keep your bathroom neat, clean and well organized, it's a must-have accessory for your bathroom cleaning. | HEAVY DUTY TOILET PLUNGER: Built with commercial grade rubber suction cup which provides maximum plunging power for clearing tough clogs of toilet bowl, shower drains and sinks. Ergonomic handle features a secure and comfortable grip, makes your plunging more effectively, it's great for commercial and residential use. | HIGH EFFICIENT TOILET BOWL BRUSH: Strong bristles are not easy to get deformed, they are economical and practical, the dense nylon bristles offers thorough and deep cleaning of under-rim area and those hard-to-reach corners. Water easily drips off bristles into steady holder, brings you a refreshing cleaning experience. | CONVENIENT STORAGE: Compact space saving design keeps your toilet brush hidden and provides a convenient storage. Ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. The neutral color combination of white and black will work in any bathroom. The whole product dimension: 8.2"L x 6.3"W x 18.1"H | STURDY CONSTRUCTION: The MR.SIGA toilet plunger and bowl brush combo is made from sturdy plastic and high grade rubber. It is designed to fit most standard toilet bowls and offers effective cleaning, ensuring your toilet bowl remains spotlessly clean.
comment 1: This plunger and bowl brush set is fantastic! The plunger works perfectly, and the brush is sturdy and cleans well without scratching. I love having both tools in one convenient set—makes bathroom cleaning so much easier. Highly recommend! - Eric Simmons
comment 2: We needed plungers for 4 bathrooms and didn’t want to spend a ton of money but wanted them to work and these are great quality. Shipped fast and work well!! - Rachael LaBounty
comment 3: It's been a little over 4 years since I bought this combo...and for the first 3 years it worked as it should. So 5 stars for that...at the time I actually bought a set for every bathroom and I have 4 bathrooms.A little over a year ago the plungers just gave it up. (3 yr lifespan) I don't know if the rubber got too old and degraded but the tapered flange (the piece that sticks into the hole in the toilet) just collapsed in on itself and no matter how many times you pulled it back out - it would collapse again. Weirdly enough it happened to 2 of my 3 downstairs toilets within about a 2 weeks of each other so now I have one left downstairs. The upstairs one is becoming a little finicky but doesn't get the use the downstairs ones do. I imagine though that we are only one good clog away from losing that little guy too.The age of the set has created another issue; I couldn't figure it out for a while but I kept noticing black scrub marks on the bowl of 2 of our toilets that worsened over time. Turns out the black brush looks terrific and in good shape but its worn out and leaving black wire marks on the toilet when you brush.The old adage, "they don't make 'em like the used to" is an apt one, As newlyweds in 1992 my husband bought a wooden red plunger from the hardware store. (We kept hidden in the garage) We moved in 2007 and the plunger is still here. It's still just as ugly, and doesn't have the tapered flange for our modern toilets...but it is 34 years old and bailed us out when the two new models failed.Seriously though, this is a really good product-but it just isn't going to last 34 years, but I still recommend the set.  I much prefer the aesthetics of the black over the white because the white brushes show EVERYTHING if you don't clean it well - and you will want it clean for a bathroom set everyone can see. - DTMEDIC
comment 4: I have a small half bath and purchased this since it’s a compact set with toilet brush and plunger. The toilet brush gets weekly use and it’s held up well. It does a good job of cleaning my toilet. The plunger looks sturdy enough. I haven’t had to use it yet. Will update my review after using it. - seamaiden
comment 5: I ordered this plunger  from Amazon and received it the same day. I had a severely backed up toilet that would not go down  at all when using the plungers I have already have at home,  no matter how hard I tried and  I tried all morning and mid-afternoon and nothing happened. I am so impressed with this plunger. It got the job done very very fast with little to no residue on it, so the clean up was very easy.  I would recommend this plunger to anyone, you won't be disappointed. Great Job MR. SIGA , you got my vote!!!!! - Katherine Daniels
